org.genthz.context

Interface Context

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InstanceContext<T>, NodeInstanceContext<T,N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InstanceContextAdapter

    public interface Context
    Top level context interface. This interface contains common methods for context such as up() - get parent context and etc.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    mathter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bindings bindings()
      Method returns Bindings for this context.
      ContextFactory contextFactory()
      Method returns ContextFactory which creates this context.
      ObjectFactory objectFactory()
      Method returns ContextFactory which processes this context.
      void objectFactory(ObjectFactory objectFactory)
      This method sets object factory for this context.
      <P extends Context>
      P      		 up()
      Method returns parent context, returns null if there is no parent context.
      Stream<Context> ups()
      Method returns Stream for enumerating of all parent context rucursively.

    • Method Detail

      • up

        <P extends Context> P up()
        Method returns parent context, returns null if there is no parent context.
        Type Parameters:
        P - type of parent context.
        Returns:
        parent context.

      • ups

        Stream<Context> ups()
        Method returns Stream for enumerating of all parent context rucursively.
        Returns:
        stream of parent contexts.

      • contextFactory

        ContextFactory contextFactory()
        Method returns ContextFactory which creates this context.
        Returns:
        context factory for this context.

      • bindings

        Bindings bindings()
        Method returns Bindings for this context.
        Returns:
        bindings.

      • objectFactory

        ObjectFactory objectFactory()
        Method returns ContextFactory which processes this context.
        Returns:
        object factory for this context.

      • objectFactory

        void objectFactory(ObjectFactory objectFactory)
        This method sets object factory for this context.
        Parameters:
        objectFactory - object factory that handles this context.
